transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, good evening sir.
Customer: Boliye boliye boliye boliye.
Executive: Ji sir, Shubham bol raha tha IndiaMART se. Ek baar sir check kar lijiye ek baar maine dale hain jo product add karwae hain aap ek baar dekh lijiye sir.
Customer: Product to dale hai ye okay ek minute main check kar raha hu.
Executive: Hmm bas 11 product diye the aapne 11 ke 11 add hai sir usme. Isme kuch cheeze mujhe thoda sa aur thoda sa update karwani hai kyuki ek do product ho na price ka issue aa raha hai kyuki jo naam aur category hai usme to wo liter ya kg me jaise hote hain sir ye.
Customer: Are wahi wahi are wahi yahi bola tha Jolly ka whatsapp check karo.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain sir?
Customer: Jolly ka whatsapp check karo.
Executive: Haan haan wo maine dekh liya mere paas maine sara sara message apne paas forward bhi karwa liye isiliye. Theek hai sir jo bhi aapne.
Customer: Abhi dala hai wo check karo.
Executive: Achha abhi dala hai aapne sir. Ek minute rukiye sir. Dekho abhi sir aa gaya 64. Abhi ek minute rukiye sir Jolly ko nahi aap mujhe bhejiye ek minute rukiye main aapko message kar raha hu aap line par rahiye. Line par rahiye aap. Haan main message kar raha hu.
Executive: Ye same number pe whatsapp hai? Same number pe whatsapp pe hai na sir aapka jisme baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Maine hide kar diya. Zero pe karo eight zero pe karo alag alag hai ye idhar kiya hai kya?
Customer: Ye ispe kiya hai main primary wale pe karu kya sir?
Executive: Nahi nahi ruko ruko ruko main karta.
Executive: Haan aapka aaya okay. Ji ji sir.
Customer: Ye rating bahut kam hai sir abhi product to dal diye aapne.
Executive: Haan main wahi to bata raha hu do dekhiye abhi sare product me kya kya cheez reh gayi hai.
Customer: Ye dusri baat Murphy best agro.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain sir?
Customer: Murphy best agro open karo.
Executive: Murphy na ek minute rukiye. Murphy M U haan Murphy best haan kar liya kar liya haan Murphy best agro haan ji sir. Wo ek se 200 gram ka packing hai upar se rate wo 200 gram wala hai aapne 420 per kg likha wo party mere ko wahi call karti na.
Executive: Nahi nahi to isme wahi cheez bataiye dekhiye sir isme kya ho raha hai na main wahi bata raha tha aapse mujhe yahi karwana tha correction isme. Main isliye to main aapko bol raha tha ye khali karna ye mere ko aata hai isme jyada time nahi lagta photo upload karna description copy karna ye karna wo main 500 product kar sakta hai lekin ye sare incorrect rate pe aate hai incorrect packing pe aate hai party party abhi aapko bhi pata hai unko kuch kaam nahi rehta kya dikha Murphy kitna hai bhai 420 per kg hai kitna wo 2500 per kg hai wo call karega are 420 per kg likha hai bhejo mere ko 10 peti unka are kaise de rahe ho aur usko bolo na are 200 wo bolta hai mere ko kya pata udhar likha hai na per kg 420 mere ko chahiye. Nahi nahi samajh gaya main. Aane lagta hai bhai. Ye ye aapka 200 ka hai na to 200 ke hisab se main paanch pack ka ek kilo ke hisab se isme rate dal deta hu sir per kg. Main main mera mera aur Jolly ko whatsapp pe jo product dale the na wo ek baar check karo udhar 200 gram likha hai matlab wo 200 gram ka hai wo aapka kharab hai. 200 gram.
Customer: Aapka manna kya hai baki kya adjust kare baki ke unhone kya kiya hai wo aap adjust nahi kar rahe isliye unhone kya kiya hai unko 1 liter hai na khali sabne 1 liter wala load kiya hai are mera aisa manna hai ki main sare packing bechta hu. Nahi to sir. Pata hai nahi nahi suno mere ko pata hai Murphy ho acrobat ho acrobat 200 gram me all India jata hai acrobat 1 kg me khali Maharashtra aur Karnataka hi jata hai. Jayega samajh gaya. 200 gram all India jata hai to 200 gram sabse jyada search hoga to main 200 gram wala lagu karunga na. Nahi nahi to isme dekhiye do cheez kar sakte hai isme dekhiye ek to aapka jo hum log product add kar rahe hain usme specification me na aapka ek pack ka price dal sakte hain 200 gram per pack ka theek hai na hum jo price dalna hai per jo price dalna hai wo kg ke hisab se dal sakte hain theek hai sir but usme main mention kar dunga ki hum hamara jo ek packet hota hai wo 200 gram ka. Nahi nahi wo kya hota abhi aap Sumimax kaise daloge batao Sumimax 10 ml 100 ko main bech raha hu barabar. Hmm hmm. To kya hua 10000 kitna hua wo bahut mahanga hua. Nahi to sir usme dekhiye nahi do product me bas dikkat dikha raha hai abhi incorrect price aap ek aapka jo dikha raha hai. Are Sumimax hai na Sumimax hai na. Samajh gaya haan samajh gaya wo sum me aa raha hai wo to kg ke hisab se. Wo all India jata hai. All season rehta hai ab kya karoge? To isme maine aapko aise maine aapko aise item diye hai to 12 months se ek bhi nahi ruke. Ab ek cheez bataiye jo Sumitomo wala jo item ka mere paas 500 ka stock hai bolo. Samajh gaya nahi nahi jaise ek cheez bataiye jo aapke Sumitomo wala hai jo product PGI wala theek hai. 5 gram iska category kya hai ye gibberellic acid hi hai na. Sir aapka ya fir. Gibberellic acid barabar gibberellic acid 5 gram wala tha yes. 5 gram ka pack hai wo pack maine dal diya ki 5 gram ka pack hai ye sir aapka theek hai na pack jo paanch weight hai iska 5 gram ka box theek hai sir. Ab hum isko sahi keh rahe ho aap usme to hum kyuki ye jo le raha hai product ke naam ke hisab se category ke hisab se acid ke naam se liter ya kg me le raha hai ye aapki bilkul main agree kar raha hu ki haan wo cheez ek ye issue aa raha hai ki hamara jo product hai wo 5 gram ka to main liter aur kg me kaise dal du. Theek hai to iska main koi main baat karunga kyuki ye cheez mere ko turant nahi kar ye ho samajh gaya aap bhi samajhiye ye aisa hai ki grade ke hisab se thoda sa issue aa raha hai unit ke hisab se. Are ye ek cheez do year do year hue main pichli baar bol chuka hu to mere ko 80 ml bechna hai to mere ko 80 ml bechna aap logo mat batao packing hi nahi hota. Nahi nahi wo wo wo rahega. Suno suno suno 1 liter ka packing nahi hota 1 liter ka packing dalne ka aapko pata hai kya company ka production hai ek 1 liter me kaise dalunga matlab main dig material bechta hu duplicate material bechta hu aisa hua. Nahi sir. Company ka standard packing kya hai 40 80 250 abhi sabse jyada market me main main bechta hu 80 ml jab mere paas 80 ml ka order aayega to mere ko puchega bhai 40 hai kya 250 hai kya. Main udhar 1 liter wala dalunga to wo party kya karegi are kya kya party hai jo 40 80 250 ml ka packing hai isne 1 liter ka dal diya hai. Koi nahi samajh gaya. Agree agree agree karta hu ek minute rukiye. Main to bol main to bolta hu 100 bhi item chhodo jitne mere 12 mahina 12 mahine me chalne wale 50 item lagao lekin wo proper lagao. Abhi aapne lagaye na aadhe se jyada wo galat item hai sare kya dekhna usme dekhna hi nahi Murphy ka season chalu hai aur kya hai wo pareshan karega mere ko 420 se 1 kg mirchi de do. Main samajh gaya aapke paas abhi ye hoga product dal ke lekin main dikkat aa raha hai price ka price incorrect nahi aa rahe unit sahi nahi ho pa rahi aapki na sir theek hai. Unit ka problem hai dusri baar wo rate rate dikhata hai. Unit ka time dijiye main samajh gaya main samajh gaya ye cheez main kal aapka ye bhi solve karwata hu sir theek hai na kal ka mujhe time dijiye theek hai na kya isme kya rahega main best ek baar baat kar lunga team se jo production team hai hamari ki kya isme kar sakte hain kis hisab se manage kar sakte hain wo main aapko dekh ke ek baar kal jo bhi hoga karwa dunga sir theek hai sir. Theek hai theek hai sir yes okay okay sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says product ratings are very low.

- Price and packing issues with products.

- Wants to sell products in specific quantities.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the issues with product listings.

- Executive assured to resolve the issues.

- Executive will discuss with the product team.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will solve the issue by tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product listing, price, quantity, ratings
